quick_context: Security by design CLI and library for AI-assisted development. Scans projects for secrets, vulnerable deps, insecure code patterns, missing auth, and generates AI threat models. Provides programmatic runGuard() API and CLI guard command for aahp-runner pre/post hook integration.

last_session.summary: Implemented aahp-runner integration: created programmatic runGuard() API (src/guard.ts), exported types (GuardOptions, GuardResult, AahpRunnerSecurityConfig), added package entry point (src/index.ts), refactored CLI guard command to use shared API, added guard tests, updated README with integration docs.

T-015.title: T-011: aahp-runner integration
T-015.notes:
Wire `secure-dev-ai guard` into `aahp-runner` as a pre/post hook.

- Before run: `secure-dev-ai guard --project <name> --pre`
- After run: `secure-dev-ai guard --project <name> --post`
- Exit run with code 1 if guard exits 1
- Make opt-in via config: `secureDevAi: { enabled: true, blockOn: 'CRITICAL' }`
- `guard` exits 0 if OK, 1 if blocked, 0 if not found (fail-open)
